name: Lucky Shot Puzzle: Roguelike Adventure
description:
Lucky Shot Puzzle: Roguelike Adventure

A fun game where you have to lay out your way to big profit in the dark corridors of the dungeon. Test your memory and luck! Stuff your pockets with gold, defeat monsters and don't forget about skills that will help you in a difficult situation!

IMPORTANT

The game is still in development

New features will added soon
